events.title: Trump acquires Hotel Delmonico, begins condo conversion
events.description: Trump buys the historic Hotel Delmonico in Manhattan for roughly $115 million, with plans to redevelop it into a luxury condominium building. Financing details remain partly undisclosed.

moneyFlow.description: Trump purchased the historic Hotel Delmonico in Manhattan for approximately $115 million with plans to convert it into luxury condominiums. The financing details for this acquisition were only partially disclosed.

events.title: SEC settlement with Trump Hotels & Casino Resorts
events.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission charged Trump Hotels & Casino Resorts with issuing a misleading earnings statement. The company settled without admitting wrongdoing, agreeing to cease and desist from similar practices.

moneyFlow.description: While no financial penalty was imposed, the SEC charged Trump Hotels & Casino Resorts with misleading investors by misrepresenting a one-time $17.2 million gain as regular income in a 1999 earnings release. The case was the SEC's first enforcement action under Chairman Harvey Pitt targeting abusive pro-forma earnings releases.

events.title: Trump purchases Ocean Trails Golf Course in California
events.description: Trump acquired the bankrupt Ocean Trails golf course in Rancho Palos Verdes, California, which had suffered a landslide in 1999. He would later redesign and rebrand it as Trump National Golf Club Los Angeles, opening in 2006.

moneyFlow.description: Trump purchased the bankrupt Ocean Trails golf course in Rancho Palos Verdes for $27 million, representing a steep discount due to the property's troubled history. The course had suffered a significant landslide in 1999, and Trump invested additional funds to redesign and repair it before reopening it as Trump National Golf Club Los Angeles in 2006.

entity-001.name: Donald J. Trump
entity-001.description: Real estate developer and businessman. In 2002, acquired the historic Hotel Delmonico in Manhattan for conversion to luxury condominiums, continuing his focus on high-end real estate development.

transactions.description: Trump's purchase of the historic Hotel Delmonico in Manhattan for conversion to condominiums.
Settlement between Trump Hotels & Casino Resorts and the SEC over misleading financial statements without financial penalty.
transactions.notes: The SEC specifically stated Donald Trump was not personally involved in crafting the misleading financial release.

transactions.description: Trump's purchase of the bankrupt Ocean Trails golf course in Rancho Palos Verdes, California.
transactions.notes: The property had suffered a landslide in 1999 and entered bankruptcy, allowing Trump to purchase it at a steep discount.
